member.summary: Initialize the debuger system.初始化日志系统
member.param: Whether to enable logging.是否打开日志
Whether to enable log display on the UI.是否在UI上边显示日志
the color with log.普通颜色
the color with warning log.警告颜色
the color with error log.错误颜色
the color with error log.正确颜色
the color with error log.崩溃颜色
